api_list.name: Historic price
api_list.description: Get the latest records from the historic price of a cryptocurrency.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptoprices.p.rapidapi.com/historic/bitcoin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptoprices.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptoprices.p.rapidapi.com/historic/{coin_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptoprices.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
